00034 void InitEditorItemStatsButtons()
00035 {
00036       iEditorButton[ ITEMSTATS_PANEL ] = 
00037             CreateTextButton( 0, 0, 0, 0, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT, 480, 361, 160, 99, BUTTON_TOGGLE, 
00038             MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK );
00039       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( iEditorButton[ ITEMSTATS_PANEL ], DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
00040       DisableButton( iEditorButton[ ITEMSTATS_PANEL ] );
00041       iEditorButton[ ITEMSTATS_HIDDEN_BTN ] =
00042             CreateCheckBoxButton(   485, 365, "EDITOR//SmCheckbox.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, ItemStatsToggleHideCallback );
00043       iEditorButton[ ITEMSTATS_DELETE_BTN ] =
00044             CreateTextButton( L"Delete", FONT10ARIAL, FONT_RED, FONT_BLACK, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00045             600, 441, 36, 16, BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL+1, DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, ItemStatsDeleteCallback );
00046 }

00057             ClickEditorButton( MERCS_PLAYERTOGGLE );

00066             CreateCheckBoxButton(   4, 402, "EDITOR//SmCheckbox.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, MercsToggleCreatures );

00764 void CreateEditorTaskbarInternal()
00765 {
00766       //Create the tabs for the editor taskbar
00767       iEditorButton[ TAB_TERRAIN ] = 
00768             CreateTextButton(L"Terrain",  (UINT16)SMALLFONT1, FONT_LTKHAKI, FONT_DKKHAKI, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00769             100, 460, 90, 20, BUTTON_TOGGLE,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, 
00770             TaskTerrainCallback);
00771       SpecifyButtonDownTextColors( iEditorButton[TAB_TERRAIN], FONT_YELLOW, FONT_ORANGE );
00772       iEditorButton[ TAB_BUILDINGS ] = 
00773             CreateTextButton(L"Buildings", (UINT16)SMALLFONT1, FONT_LTKHAKI, FONT_DKKHAKI, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00774             190, 460, 90, 20, BUTTON_TOGGLE,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, 
00775             TaskBuildingCallback);
00776       SpecifyButtonDownTextColors( iEditorButton[TAB_BUILDINGS], FONT_YELLOW, FONT_ORANGE );
00777       iEditorButton[ TAB_ITEMS ] = 
00778             CreateTextButton(L"Items", (UINT16)SMALLFONT1, FONT_LTKHAKI, FONT_DKKHAKI, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00779             280, 460, 90, 20, BUTTON_TOGGLE,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, 
00780             TaskItemsCallback);
00781       SpecifyButtonDownTextColors( iEditorButton[TAB_ITEMS], FONT_YELLOW, FONT_ORANGE );
00782       iEditorButton[ TAB_MERCS ] = 
00783             CreateTextButton(L"Mercs", (UINT16)SMALLFONT1, FONT_LTKHAKI, FONT_DKKHAKI, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00784             370, 460, 90, 20, BUTTON_TOGGLE,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, 
00785             TaskMercsCallback);
00786       SpecifyButtonDownTextColors( iEditorButton[TAB_MERCS], FONT_YELLOW, FONT_ORANGE );
00787       iEditorButton[ TAB_MAPINFO ] = 
00788             CreateTextButton(L"Map Info", (UINT16)SMALLFONT1, FONT_LTKHAKI, FONT_DKKHAKI, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00789             460, 460, 90, 20, BUTTON_TOGGLE,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, 
00790             TaskMapInfoCallback);
00791       SpecifyButtonDownTextColors( iEditorButton[TAB_MAPINFO], FONT_YELLOW, FONT_ORANGE );
00792       iEditorButton[ TAB_OPTIONS ] = 
00793             CreateTextButton(L"Options", (UINT16)SMALLFONT1, FONT_LTKHAKI, FONT_DKKHAKI, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT,
00794             550, 460, 90, 20, BUTTON_TOGGLE,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, 
00795             TaskOptionsCallback);
00796       SpecifyButtonDownTextColors( iEditorButton[TAB_OPTIONS], FONT_YELLOW, FONT_ORANGE );
00797 
00798       //Create the buttons within each tab.
00799       InitEditorTerrainToolbar();
00800       InitEditorBuildingsToolbar();
00801       InitEditorItemsToolbar();
00802       InitEditorMercsToolbar();
00803       InitEditorMapInfoToolbar();
00804       InitEditorOptionsToolbar();
00805       InitEditorItemStatsButtons();
00806 }
